SELECT rp.SHARES_CODE AS sharesCode, rp.SHARE_AMOUNT as shareAmount, rp.SHARE_TIME as shareTime, rp.SUBJECT AS subject, rp.STATUS AS status, rp.USER_ID AS userId, rp.CASE_CODE AS caseCode, c.CASE_ORIGIN AS caseOrigin, rp.DISTRICT AS district, rp.TEAM_ID AS treamId FROM sctrans.T_TS_RECEIVABLE_PERF rp LEFT JOIN sctrans.t_yucui_org_hierarchy yoh ON (rp.TEAM_ID = yoh.ORG_ID) LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE c ON (c.CASE_CODE =rp.CASE_CODE) LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_COM_SUBJECT cs ON(cs.SUBJECT_CODE = rp.SUBJECT) WHERE 1=1 AND ( yoh.DISTRICT_ID = #orgId# OR yoh.TEAM_ID = #orgId# OR yoh.HQ_ID = #orgId# ) <if test = "yuCuiOriGrpId != null and yuCuiOriGrpId != 'null' and yuCuiOriGrpId != '' "> AND ( yoh.DISTRICT_ID = #yuCuiOriGrpId# OR yoh.TEAM_ID = #yuCuiOriGrpId# OR yoh.HQ_ID = #yuCuiOriGrpId# ) </if> <if test = "status != null and status != 'null' and status != '' "> AND rp.STATUS=#status# </if> <if test="dtBegin != null and dtBegin !='' "> AND rp.SHARE_TIME >= #dtBegin# </if> <if test="dtEnd != null and dtEnd !='' "> AND rp.SHARE_TIME <= #dtEnd# </if>
<if test = "originCode!=null and originCode!=''"> <choose> <when test = "originCode == 1"> AND c.CASE_ORIGIN = 'CTM' </when> <when test = "originCode == 2"> AND c.CASE_ORIGIN != 'CTM' </when> </choose> </if> <if test="subjectCode != null and subjectCode != 'null' and subjectCode != '' "> AND cs.SUBJECT_CODE = #subjectCode# </if>
